title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 August 2015 - XWiki

10:36 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <Ramona1> has quit  
10:48 <tymik> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <tymik> Hello, can anyone tell me, where in DB Schema can I find user login? I have to change the login for a user, but I cannot find it in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/DatabaseSchema - nothing seems to store user login  
11:41 <Ramona3> has quit  
11:42 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <Ramona1> has quit  
11:55 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
12:22 <tymik> anyone can tell me about the schema?  
12:28 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <tymik> tymik: you don't have to do it on the database and there is no special table for users - user is treated as a wiki page, to change his username/login, you have to change his page  
12:53 <tymik> tymik: but be aware - after the change user will be removed from any access group, you will have to reassign him to the groups  
12:53 <tymik> tymik: ok, thank you for the answer  
12:53 <tymik> bye all  
12:54 <tymik> has left #xwiki
